content: reached do not end round 1 chain 1 single_crochet in same st and in each double_crochet and chain 1 space around 2 single_crochet in the chain 2 spaces join round 2 chain 1 single_crochet in same st *skip next single_crochet chain 1 single_crochet* around in points single_crochet chain 1 single_crochet join round 3 slip_stitch into next chain 1 space chain 3 double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet in next chain 1 space 2 double_crochet 2 chain 2 double_crochet in each chain 1 space around join and end working in the beginning chains of neckline with right side facing join in any chain 1 space with slip_stitch working in the bottom nubs of the beginning chain *skip 1 nub 5 double_crochet in next nub skip 1 nub slip_stitch* around join and end if you desire make a long chain and slip_stitch or single_crochet in each chain thread through round 1 and attach pom-poms
